snippet.title: Sulver's Journey Trailer (1)
snippet.description:
Here is a preview for Sulver's Journey. Genesis has shattered the planetary crystal into 8 shards and has spread them across planet Maroth. Collect the 8 shards from 8 separate locations, Razer's Field, Wizardly Woods, Mount Oro, Poseidon's Bay, Pharaoh's Desert, Future City, Ancient Ruins. Once you collect the 8 shards, Sulver will be able to enter Genesis's domain known as the Lost Dimension. 



Along his journey, you will come across Hunter Razer (A man convinced that beings whom posses supernatural abilities that roam freely are a threat) and  Trivoid (a humanoid whom was exposed to the energies of the energy crystal and is seeking revenge against Genesis). You will also have the option to explore several bonus areas. A special race with Hunter Razer, the hidden Savage Falls, the historic Stone Village, Sapphire's Castle and get to regularly visit Sorcerer's Summit and the Central City.


There will be weapon upgrades along the way as well as a time trial while you battle the bosses. Sulver's Journey is just the beginning.


You can all help spread the word by wish listing, liking, sharing and following Sulver's Journey here and at the below links. 



Thank you to everyone invested in the future of Sulver's Journey.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158460/SULVERS_JOURNEY/


https://twitter.com/ADARKDAYWRITER1


https://www.facebook.com/sulversjourney/
